des: "This cocktail is pretty in pink and will remind you of a spiked fruit punch.  Hence the name Prom Night, as the punch at our prom in high school was spiked."
ins: Measure the vodka, rum, and cranberry-raspberry juice into a cocktail shaker. Add a generous scoop of ice, cover and shake until frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into a martini glass to serve.
